segments.text: I see the water from the sink just pouring onto the floor, forming a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed watching her, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's going to have a big cleanup on her hands soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to reach deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a bit worried he's going to fall off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be really surprised when she finally turns around and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she does it soon, before someone gets hurt or the kitchen gets flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR
